description: An investigation is launched after the 56-year-old died during work at King William's College.
title: Isle of Man construction worker dies in scaffolding fall at college
title_page: Isle of Man construction worker dies in scaffolding fall at college - BBC News
maintext: A spokesman for King William's College said the school was "devastated by the news of today's tragic accident" and "our thoughts and sympathies are very much with Mr Skelding's family".
